item.title: Python

item.title: Typescript
item.description: I’ve been using JavaScript since 2012. jQuery then vanilla js, I’ve tried them all. But nothing even come close to TypeScript. I never wanted to go back and use vanilla js since then. I use it whenever it is possible, even for small projects.
